name: daleofmerchants-of-merchants
description: BGA Adaptation of the game Dale of Merchants

scripts.init: npm install bga-ts-template && npx bga-init DaleOfMerchants "Bart Swinkels" source --typescript --scss --vscode-extension-pack --php-8.2 --gameinfos.jsonc --gameoptions.jsonc --gamepreferences.jsonc --stats.jsonc --gamestates.jsonc

author: Bart Swinkels
